RemiliaMod:PFWZL.NAME: Rune power
DESCRIPTIONS: The power of one who is not a denizen of this world

RemiliaMod:PHWYB.NAME: Red Mist Incident
DESCRIPTIONS: Remilia changes the whole environment of Gensokyo.
Add Red Magic to your hand every turn, depending on stack value.

RemiliaMod:PQNXXG.NAME: Millenium Vampire
DESCRIPTIONS: Remilia's been alive for over 500 years
Heal for 3 + stack value for every attack played
Apply one Strength and one Dexterity each turn
At the beginning of the round, add one upgraded Defense/Offense Switch to your hand.

DESCRIPTIONS: Remilia consumes her own life to obtain power
